text: Carol Thatcher (born 15 August 1953) is a British journalist, author, and media personality.Carol Thatcher faces BBC banCarol Thatcher Wins Reality Show She was born at Queen Charlotte's and Chelsea Hospital in Hammersmith, London. She has a twin brother, Mark Thatcher. She is the daughter of former British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher (1925-2013) and her husband Sir Denis Thatcher (1915-2003). She has taken part in several television programmes including The One Show on BBC1 and I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! (in Australia). == References == Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:English journalists Category:I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! contestants Category:Margaret Thatcher Category:Television personalities from London Category:Twin people from England Category:Writers from London
title: Carol Thatcher
